verses.verse: Now there was<WH1961> a certain<WH259> man<WH376> of<WH4480> Ramathaim-zophim,<WH7436> of mount<WH4480> <WH2022> Ephraim,<WH669> and his name<WH8034> was Elkanah,<WH511> the son<WH1121> of Jeroham,<WH3395> the son<WH1121> of Elihu,<WH453> the son<WH1121> of Tohu,<WH8459> the son<WH1121> of Zuph,<WH6689> an Ephrathite.<WH673>
